column2: "Ɔsɔɔ Darius enyi dɛ ɔdze amansin ahemfo ɔha eduonu sisi ahendzi no do wɔ ahenman no nyina mu;"
"na hɔn do etsitsir baasa a hɔn mu baako nye Daniel; dɛ amansin ahemfo no mbu nkontaa nkyerɛ hɔn
column3: amma ɔhen ne biribi aannsɛɛ."

column2: "Na Daniel yi gyee dzin seen etsitsir na amansin ahemfo no
column3: osiandɛ sunsum kyɛnee bi wɔ no mu; na ɔhen no dween dɛ ɔdze no besi ahenman no nyina do."

column2: "Na etsitsir na amansin ahemfo no hwehwɛɛ dɛ wobenya asɛm bi etsia Daniel wɔ ahendzi no afamu; na woennya asɛm anaa bɔn biara; osiandɛ odzii nokwar
column3: eso woennhu no ho mfom anaa bɔn biara."
Yerinnya asɛm biara nntsia Daniel yi
column4: gyedɛ yenya no wɔ ne Nyankopɔn mbra afamu."

column2: "Nna etsitsir na amansin ahemfo yinom boaa hɔn ano baa ɔhen no nkyɛn bɛsee no dɛ
column3: Ɔhen Darius
abakomafo na amansin ahemfo
column5: abɔ mu etu egyina dɛ wɔdze ɔhen ne dzin bɛhyɛ mbra dzendzen
column7: obiara a obebisa bosom anaa nyimpa bi hɔ biribi adaduasa yi

column3: ɔhen
column5: na fa nsa hyɛ kyerɛwee no ase
column7: dɛ mbrɛ Mediafo na Persiafo mbra wɔnndan enyi no tse."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔhen Darius dze ne nsa hyɛɛ kyerɛwee no na mbra no ase."
"Na Daniel hun dɛ wɔdze nsa ahyɛ kyerɛwee no ase no
column3: ɔkɔr ne fie; (eso ne pia no ntokura ebuebue kyerɛ Jerusalɛm do); na ɔkotoow n’anankoroma enyim mprɛnsa da kor
column7: dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no nkan no ara."

column3: na wɔkɔtoo Daniel dɛ oribisa adze rokotow serɛ wɔ ne Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Nna wɔkɔree kɛkaa ɔhen no ne mbra no ho asɛm wɔ ɔhen no enyim dɛ; Ana ɔwo ennhyɛɛ mbra dɛ nyimpa biara a obebisa bosom anaa nyimpa hɔ adze adaduasa yi
column3: gyedɛ ɔwo
column6: wɔbɔtow no akyen gyatabɔn no mu? Ɔhen no buaa dɛ
column8: dɛ mbrɛ Mediafo na Persiafo mbra a wɔnndan enyi no tse."

column3: Daniel no a ofi Judafo ndɔmmummba mu no
column5: ɔhen na wo mbra a ahyɛ bi
column6: na ɔbɔ mpaa bisa adze mprɛnsa da kor."

column3: tsee asɛm yi no
column5: na osuaa n’akoma mu dɛ ɔbɛgye no
column6: na ɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen araa kodur ewimbir dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɛgye no efi mu."

column2: "Nna mbanyin yi boaa hɔn ano baa ɔhen no nkyɛn na wɔsee ɔhen no dɛ
column3: Ɔhen
column4: hu dɛ ɔyɛ Mediafo na Persiafo mbra dɛ
column5: mbra anaa ahyɛdze biara a ɔhen ahyɛ no wɔnndan no."

column2: "Na ɔhen no hyɛe ma wɔdze Daniel bae
column3: na wɔtoow no kyeen ngyatabɔn no mu. Na ɔhen no kasaa berɛww kyerɛɛ Daniel dɛ
column4: Wo Nyankopɔn a esom no daa daa no ɔnoara ɔbɛgye wo."

column3: na wɔdze hiin bɔn no ano; na ɔhen no dze nankasa ne mpɛtsea na ebirɛmpɔmfo mpɛtsea sɔɔw ano; amma wɔaannsakyer Daniel ho adze biara."
na odzii mbuada anadwe no: eso ɔamma wɔammfa enyigyedze bi ammba n’enyim: na ne nda guanee fii no ho."
na ɔdze ntsɛntsɛm kɔr ngyatabɔn no ano."

column2: "Na ɔbɛɛn bɔn no wɔ Daniel nkyɛn no
column3: ɔdze awerɛhow ndze tseaa mu: ɔhen no kasae see Daniel dɛ
column6: ana wo Nyankopɔn a esom no daa daa no etum agye wo efi ngyata no anomu anaa?"

column3: Ɔhen
ma oebomua ngyata no ano
column4: na wɔannyɛ me hwee: osiandɛ oehu me dɛ midzi bem wɔ n’enyim; na ɔwo

column3: na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wonyi Daniel mfi bɔn no mu mbra sor. Na woyii Daniel fii bɔn no mu baa sor
column4: na woennhu kam biara wɔ no ho
column5: osiandɛ ɔdze no werɛ hyɛɛ ne Nyankopɔn mu."

column3: na wɔdze mbanyin no a wɔtoatoaa Daniel no bae
column4: na wɔtoow hɔn guu ngyatabɔn no mu
column7: na hɔn yernom; na ngyata no faa hɔn do

column3: amanaman
column4: na kasa horow nyina a wɔtsetse asaase nyina do no; Onsi hom yie mbordo."

column3: m’ahenman a midzi do tum nyina mu
column4: adasa ho mpopo na wonsuro wɔ Daniel ne Nyankopɔn no enyim: na ɔno nye Nyankopɔn tseasefo
column6: na n’ahendzi dza wɔnnsɛɛ no da a
column7: na no tumdzi bɛtsena hɔ ekodu ewiei:"

column2: "ɔno na ɔgye na oyi fi mbusu mu
column3: na ɔyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze na anwanwadze wɔ sor na asaase; ɔno na oeyi Daniel efi ngyata tum nsa."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Daniel yi dzii yie wɔ Darius ahendzi mu
column3: na Persianyi Sirus ahendzi mu."
